plot: A holocaust survivor and an SS officer have a tragic first encounter at the end of WWII, and their final meeting 45 years later on the streets of New York City.
plot_es: A holocaust survivor and an SS officer have a tragic first encounter at the end of WWII, and their final meeting 45 years later on the streets of New York City.
plot_en: A holocaust survivor and an SS officer have a tragic first encounter at the end of WWII, and their final meeting 45 years later on the streets of New York City.
